review: I am really grateful to dr Soumya.  i am glad that i delivered my baby under her medical care. she's amazing. i could tell that one can be confident that all will go well under her care. She was very caring and concerning throughout my pregnancy term. Even though she has to see many patients she listened to me even to my silliest concerns and always have given satisfying explanations. She always did the routine check ups very seriously and she would ensure that all would go good.She would not take even the slightest chance.She is very advanced .She is positive and friendly.

Dr.Sowmya Raghavan was great. Ma'am was very cordial and friendly throughout our 9 months of pregnancy. She was very thorough in all the procedures and it was a pleasure to have her deliver our baby Boy. We are grateful for the seamless procedures, making them very comfortable and convenient.
Even we reached in last month of delivery, Dr Sowmya madam took almost caring on us and when ever we called madam response was awesome, even though she was busy with multiple cases.Thanks alot.
I am extremely thankful to Dr Sowmya raghavan. I had laproscopic Myomectomy. Doctor was very kind and helpful. My recovery was also good.
